timeline.message:
Implement sharedutils for scan rules

Currently used for CookieUtils, SetCookieUtils, and
AbstractAppFilePlugin.
To be used for Trusted Domains.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

Implement sharedutils for scan rules

Currently used for CookieUtils, SetCookieUtils, and
AbstractAppFilePlugin.
To be used for Trusted Domains.

timeline.bodyText:
val zap = "org.zaproxy:zap:2.7.0"
    compileOnly(zap)

    testImplementation(project(":testutils"))
    testImplementation(zap)
otherwise it would expose the test dependencies to the other add-ons.
timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+plugins {
+    `java-library`
+}
+
+description = "Common utilities for the add-ons."
+
+java {
+    sourceCompatibility = JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
+    targetCompatibility = JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    compileOnly("org.zaproxy:zap:2.7.0")
+
+    api("junit:junit:4.11")
+    api("log4j:log4j:1.2.17")
+    api("org.hamcrest:hamcrest-library:1.3")
+    api("org.mockito:mockito-core:3.1.0")

timeline.bodyText: This can be removed (with above dep changes).
timeline.author: thc202
